original_text: At the end of 70 years, the Lord will be kind to Tyre. People from all the nations of the world will come to Tyre to buy things. Tyre will receive their money, like the prostitute in the song.
korean_text: 칠십 년이 찬 후에 여호와께서 두로를 돌보시리니 그가 다시 값을 받고 지면에 있는 열방과 음란을 행할 것이며

sentences.original_text: the Lord will be kind to Tyre
People from all the nations of the world
will come to Tyre to buy things
like the prostitute in the song
